short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Domovik is a cross-browser synchronization service, letting you access all of your tabs, bookmarks, etc. in a unified way.
short.fr: Domovik synchronise vos onglets, favoris, et listes de lectures entre tous vos navigateurs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Domovik synchronizes Tabs, Bookmarks, and Reading Lists across all your supported browsers to give you a seamless cross-devices browsing experience.

- Access any tab of any synchronized browser from any browser.

- Access all of your bookmarks from any synchronized browser.

- Share Reading Lists to store ephemeral links to read later.

- Seamlessly send a page from a browser to another one.

All your data are E2E-encrypted: your browsing data stay safe and private.

This extension replaces Chrome's New Tab page with a direct access to your Synchronized Tabs and your Reading Lists.
